title: Thunderbird Avatar display
creator: Kest-09
content: Does Thunderbird support custom avatars or display avatars? If not, will it be supported in the future? I added my QQ mailbox but the avatar cannot be displayed. This is not good. The default digital avatar is not good looking.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android
